snippet: Vanessa-Mae was barred for four years for taking part in races that were fixed to allow her to qualify for the Sochi Olympics.
abstract: Pop violinist Vanessa-Mae is barred from competitive skiing for four years for taking part in races that were fixed to allow her to qualify for the Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia.
lead_paragraph: Vanessa-Mae was barred for four years for taking part in races that were fixed to allow her to qualify for the Sochi Olympics.

headline.main: Pop Violinist Barred From Competitive Racing Over Race-Fixing
